9 Alpha Diversity One common way to summarize metagenome results is to report a value of alpha diversity. This concept comes from ecology and there are several ways to measure the diversity within a sample. 9.0.1 Exercise A - Read the R documentation for the phyloseq function estimate_richness(). B - Create a data frame containing the results of the estimate_richness() function and the measures of alpha diveristy you are interested in. C - Create a data frame containing the sample metadata and the measures of alpha diversity you are interested in. D -
